metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3402 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow and several buffer overflow reads inlibyara/modules/macho/macho.c in YARA v4.0.3 and earlier could allow anattacker to either cause denial of service or information disclosure via amalicious Mach-O file. Affects all versions before libyara 4.0.4

criterions.comment: yara package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
